website_summaries.verdict: Baby can step out in style wearing these black and white geometric prints. The unisex, high-contrast color scheme and excellent absorbency make these a best bet.
pros: 15-piece set includes 7 pocket diapers, 7 reusable diaper inserts, and a wet bag to hold dirty diapers until laundry day
Reusable diaper inserts are made of an eco-friendly, 4-layer material that sucks up moisture to keep baby's skin dry
The outer shell resists moisture and stains, and gathers securely for leak-free protection
The snaps adjust to grow with baby from 10 to 33 pounds
cons: A handful of parents complained the diapers leaked

customer_reviews.title: Buy them.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Cannot say enough good things about them. I was nervous to cloth diaper but not only is it easier than I thought these are so cute! Ive gotten 2 packs of the pacific neutrals and a pack of the black&white geometric ones. The best part is the 7 packs come with wet/dry bags for on the go and I also just use them to hold the diapers in my house since I’m slowly building a stash and getting things set up the way I like them. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: raising.clarks

customer_reviews.title: Decent Pockets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pacific neutrals set and the colors are really great. They’re cut exactly like alva’s, which makes me think they’re rebranded, but I’d venture to say they’re marginally better quality. The liner doesn’t pill as much and the elastics are holding up better. Two of the diapers in the pack are extremely difficult to snap so I don’t reach for them often. The inserts are bamboo microfiber, which are, again, marginally better than plain microfiber. Overall they’re decent diapers to have in rotation, but not our favorites. Nora’s Nursery definitely knocks it out of the park color wise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, durable and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these diapers! I decided to give cloth diapers a try with my second child to save money. I chose these after reading some great reviews and of course falling in love with the prints! They are not hard to use at all. I follow the care instructions and they have held up well. I rarely have a leak unless it has been several hours (during sleep). I have not once had a blow out happen. The diapers hold everything in well. I use the diapers with disposable liners so solids do not go in the washer. I am very pleased with the diapers and the company. Give them a try! If I can do it, anyone can.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelh0428

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful cloth diapers! I love the earthy colors in their pacific neutrals and sage and sea collections and the quality is fantastic! Will definitely order more cloth diapers from Nora’s Nursery in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful prints. I am no stranger to pocket cloth ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful prints. I am no stranger to pocket cloth diapers. We have used them for years. So far these seem to be made well but only time and lots of washed will tell for sure. We were looking for an inexpensive replacement for a brand that only lasted 18 months. The cloth is soft and the inserts are absorbant. The snaps seem of lesser quality than some of the other brands that we have used. Overall I feel like they are well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Badger

customer_reviews.title: Best Cloth Diapers!
customer_reviews.text: Nora’s Nursery is our favorite brand! These diapers are amazing and you can’t beat the price! We have never had any issues with leaks and these colors are to die for. We also have Alva and Mama Koala, but the quality of these diapers surpasses the other brands. The liners hold up better and the diapers are thicker than the other brands we have. We line dry all the diapers to help them last and they still dry really quickly that way. These are the best, affordable diapers out there!
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big believer in you get what you pay for. Unfortunately, it was the same with these diapers. They were great for me when I first dove into cloth diapering, but they are now the last diapers I reach for in my stash. The prints are cute enough but the absorbency just didn’t work for us. We’ve also had a few problems with poo leaking through the seams around the leg gussets. I also find the fit to be a little wonky. In short, I would save my money and invest in some high quality diapers that will last you and your family a long time. They just didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Biesanz

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and easy to put on an toddler in motion
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby with non-standard body shape, due to adjustable thigh and tummy area. Comfortable for active baby-toddler. Fantastic absorbency, I didn’t expect it to be this good. I was scared to try reusable diapers, but when COVID-19 Was just starting and the unknowns of its effects on supply chain pushed me to try it. I couldn’t be happier. I still use disposables for night time and when we are out (10 months old). Pack of 7 is good to last a day. I did buy extra inserts. I do wash them every day and line-dry.
customer_reviews.author: Valera

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to night time diaper!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until we used these a while before reviewing, plus I tried out various other brands to compare as well. Overall, these are my go to so far for over nights and outings. No leaks when the proper inserts (absorbency) are in them. My baby was 11lbs when we bought them and they fit well at the smallest snaps. The suede liner has proven the best liner from the various liners we've had in other diapers, plus seems more resistant to breastfed poop staining! The bamboo inserts it comes with are much better then the standard microfiber inserts so many others come with. Overall, great diaper and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Update: Fabulous customer support!!  (leaking issue)
customer_reviews.text: Update: after getting in contact with customer support they generously are replacing the diapers I had an issue with. Great customer care goes a long way and I'll continue to recommend this brand for all my cloth diapering friends. I have been using the Harlow, Aztec, and Sage packages with no issues. I followed the wash instructions that came with the diapers. I washed them 4 times to enhance absorbancy and this is the first time I used it on my son. The insert isn't even half wet and was only on for an hour when it leaked out and soaked his clothes. This is the second diaper of this pack to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous & absorbent
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love Nora's nursery cloth diapers! They have unique & sophisticated prints! They are so easy to wash and absorbent. If I need extra leak protection I just add another bamboo insert. Also I've never had a poop blowout which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Diapers don't absorb urine
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the positive reviews these pocket diapers have received. I've been using them for a little over 2 weeks and they are TERRIBLE!!!!! They constantly leak urine and when I open them up to change my baby, there's just a pool of urine sitting in the diaper unabsorbed. The urine won't pass through the liner to the absorbent pad. I should have known better than to buy something manufactured in China. Cheap quality, doesn't work, 2 thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for an alternative to disposable diapers, look no further
customer_reviews.text: Very thin pads but super absorbent which is the perfect combination! I love these diapers. I have Alva baby diapers and I really like them, but the pads aren’t as nearly as absorbent. Very soft and comfortable fabric and stitching. The only relatively down side is that the inserts are thin and move around a little in the diaper which causes a few more leaks. But I doubled up on the pads and it’s perfect now. The colors are very vibrant too
customer_reviews.author: Maddison.zeabari

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good investment!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They're incredibly affordable and the prints and colors are absolutely fantastic. Great quality diapers. I bought these as a starter kit for my girl due next month, but couldn't wait to try them and ended up putting them on my 2 year old and he loves them. Comfy and we've had exactly 0 leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Skogkatt

customer_reviews.title: pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: love these so far haven’t used them but they seem high quality! did have an issue after washing per the instructions even though they haven’t been used but I think this was a fluke! nothing is perfect but these are absolutely amazing! did have a snap come off in the wash & also noticed a stain on one where it looks to have been burnt ( I didn’t dry them in a dryer so maybe in the process of sewing, not sure ) but I will say customer service was swift to offer to replace the two diapers that were not up to par & I am now happily waiting on their replacements! Happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: MommaBug

customer_reviews.title: Best pocket diapers around!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using cloth diapers for a long time. So we have tried just about every kind. Absolutely no big brand cloth diapers stand up to how absolutely amazing these are! The customer service is wonderful and we will only use these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Bird is the word

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: First time ever using cloth diapers. So far I have not had any problems with this product. My son hasn’t had a leak yet. They are pretty cute. The color looks like it kinda faded/maybe bled a little but nothing super serious. I only notice because I was the one that saw them before washing. I add an extra insert(charcoal inserts I purchased separate) at night with one of the inserts that came with the diapers and it lasts until morning. My son seems to be very comfy in them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite solid set & worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first set Nora's diapers and was very impressed with the quality and price for what you get. They're more expensive then MK or Alva sets but I like that instead of offering fiber they used bamboo. I have a harder time finding sets of solids I really like and I love all of these colors. Worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: MIA

customer_reviews.title: The best pocket diapers!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! I have a few packs of other top brand pocket diapers, but these definitely are the best. The inserts are the most absorbent ones I’ve found, and there are generally little to no leakage around the legs and waistband. We’ve had some issues with leakage with the other brands, especially overnight or when he’s clipped into his car seat. But these do not seem to have that issue. I will be purchasing another pack of this brand to have in hand. I don’t know why these aren’t more reputable in terms of top brands for pocket diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Came back for more
customer_reviews.text: I have two sets of these, purchased at two different times. As my baby got older, I found that I needed to do faster diaper changes because he didn't like to stay still like he did when he was under 6 mos old. These worked with their included inserts until about 17 mos - then I had to start double stuffing because the volume of pee he released at one time started to increase. They work a charm double stuffed. Plus they are super cute in all the black and white patterns and solids. The wash easily and the only staining I had was a result of overconsumption of blueberries. LOL. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Micazu

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly and cute diapers
customer_reviews.text: Love these diapers! They’re simple to use, easy to clean and my twins love the patterns/colors. The set included 7 diapers and a wet bag. Cloth diapers can be pricey, so I really liked the price point of these as I wasn’t paying a small fortune per diaper. I have since purchased more sets from Nora’s Nursery and have been pleased with them all.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Owens

customer_reviews.title: Love these diapers!
customer_reviews.text: Since the recent health scare in 2020 and scarcity in certain products I decided to try cloth diapering. I purchased Nora's Nursery and another very popular brand. Nora's Nursery won hands down on functionality and quality. This makes me wish I hadn't hesitated with cloth diapering years ago. I just made a second purchase and will likely purchase a third set.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca lykins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these diapers are amazing. I have purchased other brands before and haven't been happy with their quality or longevity. These however are amazing. The colors on them too are a huge bonus. I am almost tempted to buy this color combo again!
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for my needs. Definitely a great idea but it doesn't hold much or fit well for my kid. Yes it's adjustable but it's still tight around the thigh area. After one pee, it was time for a change. Probably won't hold pee and poo if it's already overflown by pee. I don't think it's worth $60 for this.
customer_reviews.author: Kyashi

customer_reviews.title: Best cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: Alva baby is my favorite cloth diaper brand other than noras nursery both are sold here on amazon and work amazing seller absorbent. Easy snaps. Easy to wash. Highly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Paige Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie we were completely against cloth diapers with our first three children, due to our new son being higly allergic to diapers and yes we tried them all we had no option then to try them. Needless to say we're kicking ourselves they are absolutely amazing!!!!!! And it really helped they were adorable... I'm about to buy more and I highly recommend anyone on here to buy them from Nora's Nursery!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good diapers for low budget but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I really do like these diapers and the prints are adorable. The interior is soft and I was surprised by the absorbency of the inserts! My biggest reason I hesitate ordering more is that compared to BG and grovia, these diapers just don’t stretch as much in the front as I would like. When my girl leans forward, I feel like the diaper is pushing into her tummy whereas the grovia and BG seem to not do that. I’d still recommend these diapers, especially to those on a budget. However, unfortunately, BG takes the favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been using these very long and bought this brand and Alvababy. I like some of the designs that this brand had and how it comes with a bag. The bag is useful and does a good job of keeping the odor in. I don’t have any complaints with the diapers either. They seem to fit well and are easy to adjust. I haven’t had any issues with leaking so far. I have only been using them for a few days so I will update as they get more use. The only downside so far is that Alvababy is a little cheaper with how many inserts you get.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: YesYesYes!!!⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Love the patterns!!! Super easy to clean my darling baby loves them and I’m so glad I went with Noras!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Invest your $$ in better quality diapers
customer_reviews.text: At first they were good. But after six months of use they started to deteriorate. Some inserts are growing holes. And the diapers have stretched out. They fall below my daughters waist and sag. I'm surprised her poop hasn't fallen out the diaper. And I know she has NOT lost weight. These are bulkier than other brands I use. Which I didn't mind because I know cloth diapers are kinda bulky in general. These went from being some of my favorite to my greatest disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these diapers! They are super absorbent and I love that they are not too bulky. I was a little skeptical at first because they are not expensive like the other brands out there, but after reading reviews and researching, I decided to go ahead and buy them. They are very well made and so cute and there isn't anything that I don't like about them. Compared to other expensive brands out there I'd say these are just as good, if not better. I'm very pleased with my purchase and plan on buying another set to replace the other brand that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Diapers
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are beautiful, absorbent, and so easy to clean! They are my favorite of all of our cloth diapers! I can’t wit for them to be in stock again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your extra money.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I bought these diapers excited to try a different brand. I have Nora’s Nursery, nickies diapers, bumgenius, AlvaBaby, mama Koala, Charlie Banana, Grovia and Pop In. They all are different and unique. But these are exactly as Alva Baby. They’re probably Alva but just with another name :( Not worth your extra money. Just buy Alva
customer_reviews.author: Estefani A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Honestly 7 diapers with a wet bag and not microfiber inserts is a pretty great deal. Great fit for us! He’s longer and not too chunky at 12 weeks here.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! I have tried over a dozen of the major brands and these are my favorites! Love my Bumgenius and Charlie Bananas too, but the way the pocket opens in the back of these with elastic on both sides like Alvas, you don't ever have to do extra tucking to make sure all the flaps are in place. Cannot beat the price for this quality and the bamboo inserts are so much better than the cheap microfiber you get with most pocket diapers. LOVE LOVE LOVE these - I have a very heavy wetter at 2 months old and 13lbs and these fit perfectly on him with the smallest rise setting. We have no leaks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy “cheap” diapers but these are great and honestly, better than my more expensive diapers. I do switch out the insert for a Green Mountain Diapers prefold but the diapers themselves are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great product and budget friendly.
customer_reviews.text: We love these diapers ! They have held up very well for daily use and are adequate for our needs. Definitely worth the price and equal in quality to other more expensive brands. Highly recommend. Side note - we do not use these for night time so I cannot attest to all night absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty prints...
customer_reviews.text: Edited: After a months use. Pros: (Adorable & sophisticated prints. Appreciated the bamboo inserts that came with, which are nice and fluffy, semi thicker & more absorbent than other bamboo inserts I have. No leaks, does what it’s supposed to! comes in 7 pack) Cons:(Snaps take a little more effort than all my other diapers.)
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: great deal great diapers
customer_reviews.text: We have been able to use this for almost over 2 years I love them. The stitching has popped off on some but nothing that can't be easily mended back together. I have no stains and the elastic is still strong and I use high heat to dry ;) rule breaker to the max! anyway You can't go wrong with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: AmericanHouseWife

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Noras cloth diapers are amazing! I love how they grow with baby. There so perfect! I have no issues with them what so ever! Just a tip, if you are starting off you defintley want more than 7 diapers. I bought the combo unisex diapers came with a total of 18 diapers & 18 bamboo inserts. Perfect stash to start off with. If you have a hevy wetter change every two to three hours and i highly recommened to double up on bamboo inserts at nighr for the baby to wake up dry. Great company, defintley will perchace more!! Perfect price, perfect for baby, and perfect for me and for my wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Gulisano

customer_reviews.title: Cute but bulky
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are adorable and easy to work with. I change them about as often as disposables with no leaks so far. The microfiber inserts are very absorbent and the lining of the diaper stays pretty dry. The only downside is they are quite bulky. I waited until my daughter was about 10 1/2 pounds and they just fit on the smallest setting and create a lot of awkward bulk under her clothes. There's no way you could put these on a 6 pound newborn like the description says. I think I will like them more as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: The jungle cat pattern is cryptic
customer_reviews.text: The patterns, which use use an ink bleeding technique are curiously cryptic. At least one of the diapers look like the bloody flesh of prey. I wonder if they will have an effect on the child’s psyche. I love noras nursery diapers. They only leak if the insert is soaked with pee. Or the insert does not absorb properly. I own six 7 diaper sets for my babies.
customer_reviews.author: jillian Marie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR FIRST TIME CLOTH DIAPERING
customer_reviews.text: They are great. I left another full review on another one of their listings. Can't say enough good things! I'm hooked and really don't think I'll ever do disposable again; cloth diapering is seriously so fun + enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute designs, but leak & lack absorbency
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value, which is why I ordered a set of 7. Also, the designs are adorable and gender neutral - which I loved. Unfortunately I found they leaked and didn’t absorb as well as other diaper brands I had previously purchased. I used other inserts and absorbency improved but the leaking continues. These are diapers I will continue to use at home when I run low of the diapers I prefer, but would not recommend them for on-the-go or nighttime diapering.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are very well made and have beautiful glossy colors which none of our other branded diapers have.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Cute diapers, but pills quickly
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are very cute and the colors are nice and rich. My main issue with them is that they starting pilling within a couple washes. I haven't had this issue with any of the other comparably priced diapers that I purchased (mama koala, alva, simple being, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have been cloth diapering for about 2 months. We love our Nora’s Nursery diapers sooo much. Our entire collection is made up of them! I highly recommend giving them a try! My daughter is 8 months old, we do have to double our inserts but she is a heavy wetter! Wonderful quality!
customer_reviews.author: Paymarie

customer_reviews.title: These did not last as long as advertized
customer_reviews.text: I have been using cloth diapers for all my children. However, there was a gap between my first 2 and my third. I had 24 fuzzy buns for the first two kids and they lasted from start to finish. I purchased these with the same expectation. However, these solid colored ones leak through the 'Waterproof' diaper. It's only been 4 months, so looks like they need to head back to the designing room. My suggestion would be to line the outer fabric with a thicker sheet of fabric. I would request either a refund or new order if I was able.
customer_reviews.author: Calvert Crary

customer_reviews.title: Cost friendly and blow out free
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about using an 'off brand' cloth diaper, but these are amazing and despite my kiddo having very healthy poops, we haven't had a single blowout in these diapers. I don't insert the liners into the shell, just lay it over with a BioVia disposable liner (which catches poop and is a must). If you're looking for cloth diapers and don't want to pay out a lot of money, these all in twos are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Came back after a YEAR to write a review—THAT good!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m more than 12 months into cloth diapering with these exclusively, and had to come back to write a review. They’re awesome. I wanted some that weren’t so expensive while we figured out if cloth was for us... and I always anticipated that they would wear our quickly because of the price. Other than a few stitches have come loose and had to be resewn, they look BRAND new. We’ve NEVER had a diaper rash, they’re super easy to clean, and we very rarely have leaks (and then only pee—we’ve never had a poop blowout, even with explosive breast milk poops!). I can not recommend these enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product that will save you a ton on disposable ...
customer_reviews.text: We have these and normal cloth diapers. Started when my son was first born with the cloth diapers and transitioned to these after a couple of months. Now we use them every day. Great product that will save you a ton on disposable diapers. Keep up with your laundry and you won't need to use anything else. Cleaning them is easy and the baby feels comfortable. Can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I'm a grandmother and these are so much easier then the old ones easy to clean get the spray mate makes it non touch no leaks
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Ponsler

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality + Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these diapers for just over a month now, and absolutely love them! They are easy to use, seem to be comfortable for our little guy, and are saving us a lot of money. These diapers are much easier to clean than I had been expecting. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: 9 months of use so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm at 9 months using these diapers during the day (have not tried nighttime - ds is a heavy wetter) and so far I really like them. They work really well and the patterns are cute. That said, they do leak (poo) here and there - usually through the seams, out the back or leg. I bought some extra charcoal bamboo liners and like those better than the ones that come with these diapers (more absorbant, wider, and much quicker to dry - I have no dryer). Also, after looking around more since buying these, there are cheaper options that look just as good. So these are 4 stars. I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schaff

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Super love them ! everything about these diapers I like them, I was discouraged because I buy 3 super expensive and I don't like them at all but definitely these Nora's Nursery are amazing ... hoping to buy more soon
customer_reviews.author: Estephany GT

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and price
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so beautiful in this set. Great quality and price point. Haven’t tried them yet as I’m expecting, but looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: kara ray

customer_reviews.title: very quality product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: i love the adjustable fit and the stuffers for these are the best i have ver had (i have had three other companies and five differnt suffer types to compair with). they look great with mutible patterns in supper soft plu lined fabric, we love them so much this is our second order to fill in outfit colors and replace cheeper ebay ones that just didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Diapers
customer_reviews.text: Diapers are gorgeous! I have not used them yet, because I am buying way ahead of time but the diapers are not cheaply made. The snaps are in for the long haul and the threading looks like it was done tightly. I was a little concerned because the price compared to some of the other cloth diapers out there was a lot cheaper but these are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months of use the stitching has come undone. Highly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B.

customer_reviews.title: These are good inexpensive cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: These are good inexpensive cloth diapers. I have been using them for 2 months now with my almost fully potty trained 20 month old. Fabric easily washed and destrained . The threading does seem to come off a bit in the exterior part on the inside but nothing to prevent it from performing . I am happy with my purchase just hoping to see that it will last us a long time
customer_reviews.author: bar

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many brands and Norah’s Nursery are the first diapers we grab for a change and the brand we most recommend to friends who ask us about cloth diaperIng
customer_reviews.author: Erik Andrea Rishel

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I am a brand new first-time mom, and I always entertained the idea of cloth diapers but didn't know what it would take, just like I had no idea what being a new mom means. The positive reviews made me decide to purchase Nora's Nursery diapers and it has been the easiest and most positive experience. I just placed my 3rd order for a few additional ones. They work overnight, do not leak, easy to clean, and have an amazing quality! I cannot recommend them enough. Thank you for everyone at Nora's Nursery for creating these superb diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Timea Peto

customer_reviews.title: I love these diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these diapers! I love the print, I love the fabric, I love the softness of the inserts, I just love everything! The snaps are easy, not loud when a sleepy baby is getting rustled to change quickly. I just love this brand of diapers and am so glad I chose to do cloth diapers....at 3 weeks old!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute patterns
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these diapers for about a month now. I love them! There were some leakage issues at first, but that was due to user error. There's definitely a bit of a learning curve, but once you get the hang of it, it's a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and the price. I have been looking for a pocket that was affordable and comfortable. When I saw Nora's Nursery I was excited to see the low price. It was also ironic my daughters name is Nora. I have not fully prepped the insert so I cannot say as to how well it absorbs. I have been using a Thirsties hemp insert in the diaper while the other insert is being prepped. I hope that I continue to love this diaper as much as I have so far and hope to purchase more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo247

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend these diapers
customer_reviews.text: These are the first cloth diapers I bought and I think they're pretty good. They're very absorbent, easy to wash, easy to use. We did have a couple of leeks at the very beginning, but I think it was mostly because I didn't tighten the diaper well enough, and also because my newborn was very small at the time. They're a bit bulkier than disposable diapers under the clothing, but I definitely would recommend these diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are absolutely beautiful! The colors are even more stunning in person. The inserts absorb as expected. I just love love LOVE them! The wet bag is great too I love that it has 2 separate compartments. Great quality at an affordable price! I would most definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Better than diapers
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use the inserts. Just used as panties. My daughter loved having big girl panties. She did have some accidents. But was able to clean up easy. Adorable design. a lot cheaper than Diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite diapers.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set of Nora’s. We bought another because we love them so much. Our little one has never leaked out of these and they fit him very well. He is 3 months old and we are hoping that they continue to keep his pee in. We have flip diaper covers as well with cotton inserts and he pees out of them frequently. We love how easy Nora’s are to wash and the prints are adorable! They seem very durable for now, but we have only been using them for about 2 months so I will update after a few months. He started to wear them when he was about 9 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: NMK

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to cloth diapering but I loooove these diapers! They were a little intimidating at first because of all the buttons but now it's a breeze! I use these on my 5 month old (all day) and my 3 year old (at night only). My 3 year old would pee through disposables so I'm glad that I found Nora's!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: First of all the covers are so adorable. These covers fit my daughter so well. It keep her dry about 95% of the time which is the same as her disposable diapers. They are just as good as bumgenius if not better and a fraction of the cost. The bumgenius insert gives my daughter a rash where the Nora nursery inserts do not. The inserts are easy to clean and dry making cloth diaper experience that much better. I would recommend these to anyone looking to do cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rowley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are so impressed with these diapers! We just recently switched to cloth diapering and these diapers are a life savor! They have not leaked yet and our little one is a heavy wetter and we only have to use one liner! They are also super simple to clean and leave no stains. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe J.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I've used these about a month now on my soon to be three month old baby girl. So far I really like them. The only thing I wish they had were adjustable leg holes like the Charlie bananas. But they haven't leaked any which is the most important part. Super cute designs and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan K Honaker

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for skinny thigh babies.
customer_reviews.text: I just though I would try out these diapers to see how quality they are, since they are so inexpensive. I am not impressed with them at all. Even with the overlapping snaps and the rise setting all the way up, I cannot get a secure fit around the thighs for my 11lb girl. They are pretty cheaply made but I did expect that. I will definitely be splurging for less diapers of a better quality. However, I did love the color combo. Pacific neutrals are very gender neutral plus a nice break from all the patterns and bright colors of cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M.

customer_reviews.title: First time user and I am in love with these!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using cloth diapers and I have to admit I was a little nervous at first but these Nora's Nursery diapers are amazing! The diapers have so many different adjustable snaps to make it comfortable for your baby. I have been using for about a week now and love them. My baby is 7 months old and has not yet had a leak at all and she wears them through the whole night. They also wash really well and there hasn't been any stains. I make sure to rinse the pad and diaper within an hour after each change and wash them within two days. I will definitely be purchasing more. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L.

customer_reviews.title: Best inserts!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great diapers. The bamboo inserts are my all time favorite. Very absorbing and so so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Andrea Rishel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these diapers the prints are adorable and the quality is excellent! I will for sure be purchasing more. This is my first time cloth diapering my second child and it is so refreshing to find such a great company that values the quality as well as the customer with their great prices on diapers!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! I'm new to cloth diapering and trying out a bunch of different brand and styles. This is one. I would put it at the top of my list. It's soft and comfortable for my baby. It's easy to use and so far has not leaked. It's only been used a few times (just ordered one of Nora's diapers so far), but I'm very happy so far! I'll update if anything changes :)
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: First time cloth diapering made easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with easy instructions emailed to you for extra help. After a lot of research, I found this brand and gave it a shot. It took one day to determine that this was the way to go. Already ordered more. They're much more comfortable for the baby, quite absorbent, and haven't seemed to hold a stain. Would absolutely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: but stylish and easy to use/wash
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what they're made to do, but stylish and easy to use/wash. No special "method" required for these awesome diapers. We bought them to rotate in to our already "eclectic" collection and they've already become the favorites. Cloth diapering can be expensive at first, but this bundle is priced well and promises to hold up over the 2 years we'll need them.
customer_reviews.author: RA in the Rockies

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: My son is 1 year and he just now started to develop super bad diaper rashes. I tried every cream but nothing worked. I decided to switch to cloth diapers. These were the cutest ones on amazon so that’s why I picked this brand. They have worked great. I bought extra diaper inserts for night time from a local store but I have LOVED these diaper. The only problem is I want more!! I’ve shared these with plenty of friends because I’m obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Ajohnson

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful diapers! Have held up great in the wash, don't retain smells, resist stains. Lots of flexibility with snap sizing, good absorbency and adorable designs. Definitely recommend for first time cloth diapering parents. Don't break the bank on pricier options until you give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Duh Slacks

customer_reviews.title: Best cloth diapers we own.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. We love the color of these diapers and as well they’re so soft. My little one loves these ones to sleep in. We alternate between these and mamakoala but honestly these are our favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Twyla

customer_reviews.title: Good cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love Noras diapers. I was so excited when I saw these were back in stock finally! Only downside I did have two diapers that had messed up snaps. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and pretty colors, I tell everyone to cloth diaper
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and pretty colors, I tell everyone to cloth diaper. The only reason I give a 4 is because I have to change diapers often. Two hours is way too long for my daughter for it does not hold a lot of moisture and there is leakage often. I have the liners that come with it and sometimes I layer up with BumGenius liners that I have for additional protection. But they are very cute and help protect from diaper rashes and other irritations.
customer_reviews.author: iamfashion

customer_reviews.title: Great for overnight wetters over disposable diaper!!
customer_reviews.text: Great to use for boys who are leaking at night. My son started leaking out his diaper around 6 months and I tried everything from 2 diapers to larger sizes to overnight diapers. I ended up purchasing these and trying them without the insert and just using the cover over a disposable and it has been a LIFE SAVER!! We haven’t had any incidents at night and the prints and fabric are great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Noras nursery cloth diapers is a must
customer_reviews.text: First time using and i got to say its awesome pretty easy clean up! Money saver is a plus and of course the buttons!! <3
customer_reviews.author: Crystal  Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo is good
customer_reviews.text: These work great as long as you change your child regular you shouldn't have leaks Bag is good to had no problems with it had it for over a month or 2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 3 packs of these and I think it was a great deal price wise
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as describes, I ordered 3 packs of these and I think it was a great deal price wise, and the quality of each diaper bag is awesome! I didn’t know the inside of the bag was like waterproof type so it didn’t leak or bleed through easy. Also came with extra inserts! Super pleased with my purchase and plan to order more in the future, especially since they arrived in under a week!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Best diapers for this price range!
customer_reviews.text: I love Nora's Nursery diapers. They are adorable and are a great price for what you get with the bamboo inserts instead of getting microfiber. They have unique designs and my little baby girl loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: BEST DIAPERS
customer_reviews.text: These are the best diapers! I was nervous about trying cloth diapers with my daughter (our first) but these are such a breeze! This is my way to help our family save money (with disposables I felt like I was throwing dollars in the trash with every change) and using these makes me feel like I'm saving so much more! Thank you, Nora's Nursery!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Torgerson

customer_reviews.title: Same as Alva Diapers
customer_reviews.text: These are the same as Alva only under a different brand name. The patterns are better, but not justifiable for the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love love loveeee
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love boras nursery 😍🥰 the colors are beautiful and vibrant and the fit is great especially for chunky babies
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lynn Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Quality diapers
customer_reviews.text: Seller was very responsive and helpful in answering questions. Diapers are of good quality and style. Make sure to read e book that seller will provide before anything. Also make sure to take your time putting the diapers on properly to ensure they don't leak.
customer_reviews.author: K Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great value best design!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are my favorite cloth diapers I have! The colors with this set are so simple and neutral so I love them. They can easily be made to fit a newborn with the newborn hack. Work great with my pockets!
customer_reviews.author: NavyCat

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: So far I absolutely love them. They are very cute and the absorbency is equal to the disposable ones. They come with instructions on how to care for the diapers so it made it easier for me since I am brand new to the world of cloth diapers :D
customer_reviews.author: Gakbanolli

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Nora's nursery diapers. This is the third pack we have purchased and we love them just as much. The prints are so adorable. We double up on the liners since my daughter is a little bit older and wets a bit more and that is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Holzhauer

customer_reviews.title: They are really good quality! Really gentle for baby skin and really ...
customer_reviews.text: They are really good quality! Really gentle for baby skin and really absorbent, no licking during nights! The only thing is because they fit any size they look huge for NB, they still work awesome but they are big for 3month old babies or less. But the quality is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Elastic in back too tight.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 11 pounds and the elastic on the back is too hard and tight on her . It does not stretch hardly at all and the inserts were bunching because of this as well . They asked for pictures to help with the problem then never responded back after pictures were sent .
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani C.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these. They seem like high quality for a great price. I have had a few small leaks, so I’ve ordered some additional prefolds to go on top to help with the inserts in the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Ahzelstar

product_meta.title: Unisex Baby Cloth Pocket Diapers 7 Pack, 7 Bamboo Inserts, 1 Wet Bag by Nora's Nursery
feature_bullets: NO LEAKS - Snug leg openings and waterproof cover, breathable suede cloth is soft on baby's skin
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Our customer service in unparalleled and we are committed our customers. If you are not 100% satisfied, return your order with no questions asked!
GROWS WITH YOUR CHILD - Adjustable snap layout fits babies and toddlers from 10 to 33 pounds so you save time and money looking for different sizes
SAVE MONEY AND THE ENVIRONMENT - Reusable diapers are budget friendly and environmentally conscious
LESS STAINS NO MESS - No more compression leaks with these super absorbent 4-layer bamboo polyester inserts are softer and more absorbent with every wash

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
